Symbol.Script_1D:
EPS = 0.0001
! iVentilationProfileType VENTPROFILE_OVER_FRAME = 2 VENTPROFILE_OVER_GLAZING = 3
! iWindowType: WIN_W1 = 1 WIN_WDoubleSash = 2 WIN_W2 = 3 WIN_W2Sidelight = 4 WIN_W3 = 5 WIN_W32Sidelights1 = 6 WIN_W32Sidelights2 = 7 WIN_WVariable = 8 WIN_WVariableDoubleSash = 9 WIN_HistoricWindowSingle2 = 10 WIN_HistoricWindowSingle = 11 WIN_HistoricWindowDouble = 12 WIN_HistoricWindowTriple = 13 WIN_HistoricWindowSegmented = 14 WIN_HistoricWindowTripleArched = 15 WIN_W2HorizontalSlide = 16 WIN_W4HorizontalSlide = 17 WIN_Curved = 18 WIN_Bow = 19 WIN_SplayBay = 20 WIN_SquareBay = 21 WIN_Ribbon = 22 WIN_WSingleHung1 = 23 WIN_WSingleHung2 = 24 WIN_WSingleHung3 = 25 WIN_WDoubleHung1 = 26 WIN_WDoubleHung2 = 27 WIN_WDoubleHung3 = 28 WIN_WRound = 29 WIN_WOval = 30 WIN_WMultiside = 31 WIN_WHalfRound = 32 WIN_WQuarterRound = 33 WIN_WPentagon = 34 WIN_WTriangle = 35 WIN_WEyebrows = 36 WIN_WArched = 37 WIN_WTrapezoid = 38 WIN_WTrapezoidDoubleSash = 39 WIN_VentWindow = 40 WIN_2SashSliding = 41 WIN_MultisashHorizontal = 42 WIN_MultisashVertical = 43 WIN_GlassBlock = 44 WIN_TerraceDoorSWE = 45 WIN_W3HorizontalSlide = 46 WIN_W6HorizontalSlide = 47 WIN_VentilationBrick = 48 WIN_Rhomb = 49 WIN_Skewed = 50 DOOR_NoSidelight = 100 DOOR_OneSidelight = 101 DOOR_TwoSidelight = 102
! iMullionStyle MULLION_NONE = 1 MULLION_HVGRID = 2 MULLION_EDITABLEGRID = 3 MULLION_CUSTOM = 4 MULLION_PRAIRIE = 5 MULLION_DIVIDED = 6 MULLION_SOLID_GLAZED = 13 MULLION_DIVIDED_FRAME = 14 MULLION_SOLID_PANEL = 15 MULLION_VENT_PANEL = 16
bFoundVentilationProfile = 0 bFoundCustomMullion = 0 bFoundVentPanelMullion = 0 if bVentilationProfile then if (iVentilationProfileType = VENTPROFILE_OVER_GLAZING) then dim sashID[10] for i = 1 to 10 sashID[i] = 0 next i
if iWindowType = WIN_MultisashHorizontal |\ iWindowType = WIN_MultisashVertical then
for i = 1 to 10 sashID[i] = CasementIDArray[1][i] * (i < (gs_panes_number + 1)) next i else if iWindowType = WIN_W4HorizontalSlide |\ iWindowType = WIN_W3HorizontalSlide |\ iWindowType = WIN_W2HorizontalSlide |\ iWindowType = WIN_W6HorizontalSlide then
if iWindowType = WIN_W6HorizontalSlide then sashID[1] = 3 sashID[2] = 1 sashID[3] = 2 sashID[4] = 4 sashID[5] = 6 sashID[6] = 5 endif
if iWindowType = WIN_W4HorizontalSlide then sashID[1] = 3 sashID[2] = 1 sashID[3] = 2 sashID[4] = 4 sashID[5] = 7 * (gs_UTrans & (iUTrans = 1 | iUTrans = 3)) sashID[6] = 5 * (gs_UTrans & (iUTrans = 1 | iUTrans = 3 | iUTrans = 4)) sashID[7] = 6 * (gs_UTrans & (iUTrans = 1 | iUTrans = 2)) sashID[8] = 8 * (gs_UTrans & (iUTrans = 1 | iUTrans = 2 | iUTrans = 3)) endif
if iWindowType = WIN_W3HorizontalSlide then sashID[1] = 3 sashID[2] = 1 sashID[3] = 4 sashID[4] = 7 * (gs_UTrans & (iUTrans = 3)) sashID[5] = 5 * (gs_UTrans & (iUTrans = 3 | iUTrans = 4)) sashID[6] = 8 * (gs_UTrans & (iUTrans = 3)) endif
if iWindowType = WIN_W2HorizontalSlide then sashID[1] = 3 sashID[2] = 1 endif else if isWindow then sashID[1] = CasementIDArray[2][2] sashID[2] = CasementIDArray[2][3] * gs_bSLight sashID[3] = CasementIDArray[2][1] * gs_bLeftSLight sashID[4] = CasementIDArray[3][2] * gs_LTrans sashID[5] = CasementIDArray[3][3] * (gs_LTrans & gs_LTrans_Div) sashID[6] = CasementIDArray[3][1] * (gs_LTrans & gs_LTrans_Div) sashID[7] = CasementIDArray[1][2] * gs_UTrans sashID[8] = CasementIDArray[1][3] * (gs_UTrans & gs_UTrans_Div) sashID[9] = CasementIDArray[1][1] * (gs_UTrans & gs_UTrans_Div) sashID[10] = 0 else sashID[1] = CasementIDArray[2][2] sashID[2] = CasementIDArray[2][3] sashID[3] = CasementIDArray[2][1] sashID[4] = CasementIDArray[3][2] sashID[5] = CasementIDArray[3][3] sashID[6] = CasementIDArray[3][1] sashID[7] = CasementIDArray[1][2] * gs_UTrans sashID[8] = CasementIDArray[1][3] * gs_UTrans sashID[9] = CasementIDArray[1][1] * gs_UTrans sashID[10] = 0 endif endif endif
dim isVentilationProfileInSash[11] isVentilationProfileInSash[1] = isVentilationProfileInSash_01 isVentilationProfileInSash[2] = isVentilationProfileInSash_02 isVentilationProfileInSash[3] = isVentilationProfileInSash_03 isVentilationProfileInSash[4] = isVentilationProfileInSash_04 isVentilationProfileInSash[5] = isVentilationProfileInSash_05 isVentilationProfileInSash[6] = isVentilationProfileInSash_06 isVentilationProfileInSash[7] = isVentilationProfileInSash_07 isVentilationProfileInSash[8] = isVentilationProfileInSash_08 isVentilationProfileInSash[9] = isVentilationProfileInSash_09 isVentilationProfileInSash[10] = isVentilationProfileInSash_10 isVentilationProfileInSash[11] = isVentilationProfileInSash_11
dim iMullionStyle[11] iMullionStyle[1] = iMullionStyle_01 iMullionStyle[2] = iMullionStyle_02 iMullionStyle[3] = iMullionStyle_03 iMullionStyle[4] = iMullionStyle_04 iMullionStyle[5] = iMullionStyle_05 iMullionStyle[6] = iMullionStyle_06 iMullionStyle[7] = iMullionStyle_07 iMullionStyle[8] = iMullionStyle_08 iMullionStyle[9] = iMullionStyle_09 iMullionStyle[10] = iMullionStyle_10 iMullionStyle[11] = iMullionStyle_11
for i = 1 to 10 if sashID[i] > 0 then j = sashID[i] if isVentilationProfileInSash[j] then bFoundVentilationProfile = 1 if iMullionStyle[j] = MULLION_CUSTOM then bFoundCustomMullion = 1 if iMullionStyle[j] = MULLION_VENT_PANEL then bFoundVentPanelMullion = 1 endif next i endif
if (iVentilationProfileType = VENTPROFILE_OVER_FRAME) then bFoundVentilationProfile = 1 endif endif
end bFoundVentilationProfile, bFoundCustomMullion, bFoundVentPanelMullion
